item.title: Alchemical Failsafe
item.fluff: When you become too battered to continue fighting at full strength, this launcher located in your abdomen automatically triggers an alchemical item

block.name: Property
block.line: You can stow one consumable alchemical item within this item. Only you can draw the stowed item.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: RequirementYou have a consumable alchemical item stowed in this item, and the alchemical item's level is no more than 5 levels higher than this item's level.
TriggerYou use your second wind
EffectYou use the stowed alchemical item without having to use an action to draw it or activate its power.

item.title: Baldric of Dividing Ranks
item.fluff: Foot soldiers ineffectually stumble aside as you stride through battle wearing this baldric

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 item bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks triggered by movement. This increases to a +3 item bonus against minions.
Level 17+4 item bonus against minions.
Level 27+3 item bonus, or +6 item bonus against minions.

item.title: Baldric of Time
item.fluff: When you slip on this belt, you feel a brief lurch as the march of time seems to skip a beat

block.name: Property
block.line: When you a roll a natural roll of 20 on an initiative check, you gain an extra move action during your first full turn of the encounter.
Level 16An extra minor action and move action.

item.title: Barbed Baldric
item.fluff: Hooked metal barbs spring from this belt on command, making it dangerous for anyone grabbing you.

block.name: Property
block.line: At the start of your turn, each enemy grabbing you takes 1d12 damage.
Level 152d12 damage.
Level 253d12 damage.

item.title: Belt of Dwarvenkind
item.fluff: The delicate metalwork of this belt is unmistakably magical, as is the feeling that courses through you when you lash it on

block.name: Properties
block.line: The belt of dwarvenkind has the following properties:
You gain a +2 bonus to Diplomacy checks and Intimidate checks against dwarves.
You can speak, read, and write Dwarven.
If you are a dwarf, you can use both of the powers of the belt as opportunity actions instead of immediate actions.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn attack pushes, pulls, or slides you
EffectYou reduce the maximum distance of the forced movement by 1.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou take ongoing poison damage
EffectYou make a saving throw against the triggering ongoing poison damage.

item.title: Belt of Endurance
item.fluff: Stitched from the hides of various animals, this belt gives you a beastly endurance
item.headline: Endurance checks

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou would make an Endurance check
EffectTreat your check as if your roll was a 20. This does not count as rolling a natural 20 for effects that require it.

item.title: Belt of Feral Vigor
item.fluff: This belt intensifies the rageblood that flows your veins

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain a +2 bonus to the resist you gain from your Rageblood Vigor class feature.
Level 13: +3 bonus.
Level 23: +4 bonus.

item.title: Belt of Fitness
item.fluff: This well-made champion's belt lets you use your endurance to resist bodily harm

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: Level 17This power is an encounter power instead.
TriggerYou are hit by an attack against your Fortitude
EffectTreat your Fotitude defense as having a value equal to 10 + your Endurance check modifier against the triggering attack.

item.title: Belt of Flanker's Bane
item.fluff: When wearing this belt, a subtle shift of your weight is all you need to send a flanking enemy scrambling

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy that is flanking you targets you with a melee attack
EffectYou slide the triggering enemy up to 2 squares to a space adjacent to you.

item.title: Belt of Recovery Chance
item.fluff: When you suffer a telling blow, this belt bolsters your defenses, giving you a chance to recover

block.name: Property
block.line: When a critical hit is scored against you, you gain a +2 bonus to the defense that the attack targeted. This bonus can accept multiple defenses, but does not stack with itself.

item.title: Belt of Resilience
item.fluff: This common and well-worn belt aids those who aid you

block.name: Property
block.line: Heal checks made to aid you gain a +2 item bonus.
Level 11: +5 item bonus
Level 21: +10 item bonus

item.title: Belt of Righteous Blood
item.fluff: The buckle on this well-worn belt holds a tiny vial of thick, reddish liquid, purported to be the blood of the virtuous

block.name: Property
block.line: Any vampiric regeneration you have increases by 1.
Level 13: Increases by 2
Level 23: Increases by 3

item.title: Belt of Righteous Vigor
item.fluff: This iron-plated belt was first crafted to protect against the underhanded tactics of goblins and giants

block.name: Property
block.line: While you are at 0 hit points or fewer, you have resist 10 all.
Level 16Resist 10 all.
Level 26Resist 30 all.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerAn enemy reduces you to 0 hit points or fewer
EffectThe triggering enemy takes the same amount of damage as you. This damage is typeless, and cannot be reduced or prevented.

item.title: Belt of Supported Recovery
item.fluff: This belt of leather allows you to help others heal

block.name: Property
block.line: Each ally within 5 squares of you gains a +1 item bonus to his or her healing surge value.
Level 17+2 item bonus.
Level 27+3 item bonus.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectRanged 5 (one ally); You expend two healing surges to allow the target to regain one healing surge.

item.title: Belt of the Brawler
item.fluff: Your punch packs a wallop when this belt is about your waist

block.name: Property
block.line: You make improvised attacks, including unarmed attacks, as if you were armed with a club.
Level 8: A +1 magic club
Level 13: A +2 magic club
Level 18: A +3 magic club
Level 23: A +4 magic club
Level 28: A +5 magic club

item.title: Belt of Vigor
item.fluff: This chain metal belt improves your recuperative abilities

item.title: Cincture of Dragon Spirit
item.fluff: This scaly belt infuses you with ferocity of a dragon

block.name: Property
block.line: You can use your Strength modifier instead of your Charisma modifier when you make an Intimidate check.

item.title: Contortionist'a Cord
item.fluff: This extremely flexible snakeskin binding allows you to quickly squeeze through tight spots

block.name: Property
block.line: While squeezing, you move at full speed and do not take penalties to attack rolls. You still grant combat advantage for squeezing.

item.title: Girdle of the Oxen
item.fluff: With this belt, you can bull rush enemies farther than normal

block.name: Property
block.line: When you bull rush a target, you can push it 1 additional square.

item.title: Ironskin Belt
item.fluff: This belt made of chain links can be activated to provide protection from weapons

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou gain resist 5 against Weapon damage until the end of your next turn.. Your DM might allow this to apply against other physical sources of damage.
Level 15Resist 10.
Level 25Resist 15.

item.title: Jet Pack
item.fluff: A metallic pack clasps around one's middle, and projects flame directly underneath the wearer

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: EffectYou fly 2d10 squares upward, and then fall.
MalfunctionIf you roll a 1 on each d10, you fly 1d10 squares in a random direction. You cannot fly the full distance because of blocking terrain, you take 2d10 damage.

item.title: Muleback Harness
item.fluff: This unadorned harness allows you to carry and drag heavier loads

block.name: Property
block.line: When determining your normal load, heavy load, and maximum drag load, you treat your Strength score as 5 points higher.
Level 12: 10 points higher
Level 22: 15 points higher

item.title: Rager's Belt
item.fluff: This double-thick leather and scale belt might well be the only thing holding your guts together

block.name: Property
block.line: When you drop to 0 hit points or less while raging, you can reroll your first failed death save with a +2 bonus.
Level 12: +4 bonus, and you do not drop out of rage if you do not want to

item.title: Sash of Prone Fighting
item.fluff: You figh as well on your back as on your feet while wearing this frayed sash

block.name: Property
block.line: You do not take the -2 penalty to attack rolls for being prone.
Level 17You also do not grant combad advantage for being prone.

item.title: Stalwart Belt
item.fluff: Each time you deal a grievous blow to an enemy, you feel the invigorating power of this belt

block.name: Property
block.line: When you score a critical hit, you gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier.
Level 16Twice your Constitution modifier.
Level 26Three times your Constitution modifier.

item.title: Viper Belt
item.fluff: This snakeskin belt provides protection against poison

block.name: Property
block.line: You gain resist 5 poison.
Level 14Resist 10 poison.
Level 24Resist 15 poison.

block.name: Utility Power
block.line: TriggerYou make a saving throw against a Poison effect and dislike the resutl
EffectYou gain a +2 power bonus to the triggering saving throw.
